Articles.Content: Built a very simple rocket but it seems I'm stuck in the stage mode and can't launch. Looked all over the interwebs but cant find any info. I found the ps4 controls online and used the controls help in game but still cant figure out what buttons to push.
Would you mind posting a screen shot of your rocket on the launch pad with your staging in view? If it is easier for you, you can send the screen shot to my PSN Willie-Wall
Hold up on the directional pad to increase the throttle, then you press X to ignite the engine
